LifeCycles.purpose: Initializes the diretive or component and sets input properties
LifeCycles.timing: Called once after the first ngOnChanges()

LifeCycles.purpose: Responds after the external content displays in the component view
LifeCycles.timing: Called once after the first ngDoCheck()

LifeCycles.purpose: Responds after Angular initializes the components views and child views
